#Text=2007 Rugby World Cup : Georgia claim first World Cup victory
#Text=Friday , September 28 , 2007
#Text=Georgia
#Text=won their first ever match in a World Cup with a 30-0 victory over Namibia on Wednesday .
#Text=Romania
#Text=came from behind to defeat Portugal 14-10 , while Samoa won 25-21 despite a late fightback from the United States .
#Text=Japan
#Text=scored a last minute try to draw 12-12 with Canada .
#Text=Japan
#Text=took an early lead when Kosuke Endo scored a try in the only score of the first half .
#Text=Pat Riordan and D T H van der Merwe both scored in the second half as Canada led 12-5 .
#Text=However Koji Taira scored for Japan in injury time and Shotaro Onishi added the conversion to tie the match 12-12 .
#Text=Both sides are eliminated from Pool B .
#Text=Australia have qualified for the quarter-finals , while Wales and Fiji face each other for second place .
#Text=In Pool C , World Cup debutants Portugal led Romania 7-0 at half time thanks to a try from Joaquim Ferreira .
#Text=Marius Tincu scored for Romania with less than twenty minutes left to level the scores , before Goncalo Malheiro kicked Portugal back into the lead with a penalty .
#Text=Florin Corodeanu however won the match for Romania with a 72nd minute try .

#Text=Neither side can qualify from the pool , but Portugal pick up a bonus point while Romania move on to five points behind Italy , who must play Scotland to decide second place as New Zealand have won the pool .
#Text=Georgia
#Text=comfortably defeated Namibia 30-0 to record their first ever victory in any World Cup appearance .
#Text=Merab Kvirikashvili
#Text=opened the scoring with two penalties while Akvsenti Giorgadze scored the first try just before half time bringing the score to 13-0 .
#Text=Another penalty from Kvirikashvili and two late tries from Irakli Machkhaneli and Davit Kacharava completed the victory for Georgia .
#Text=Namibia are eliminated from Pool D , having lost all their matches .
#Text=Georgia are fourth in the group with five points , behind Ireland on nine .
#Text=In Pool A , Samoa won their first match of their World Cup with a 25-21 victory over the United States .
#Text=Lome Fa'atau
#Text=and Alesana Tuilagi scored tries for Samoa as they raced to an early lead .
#Text=Mike Hercus
#Text=scored a penalty for the Americans , but just before half time Kane Thompson scored Samoa 's third try bringing the score to 22-3 at the interval .
#Text=A late fightback from the United States , with tries from Takudzwa Ngwenya and Louis Stanfill , was not enough to win the match but earned them a bonus point .
#Text=Both Samoa and the USA are eliminated from Pool A. South Africa are top of the group , while England play
#Text=Tonga for second place .
